page.title: 04GUITING POWER.GUEST HOUSE
page.content: The Guest House serves coffees and teas,and also provides bed and breakfast for visitors. It opens at 10 a.m., and closes again at 5.30p.m. People have come from all over the world- France, Netherlands, Germany,New Zealand and the U.S.A. There are 4 bedrooms. For breakfast they offer grapefruit,fruit juice,bacon,egg,tomato,fried bread and wholemeal rolls. Supplies come from a Cash and Carry in Birmingham. They advertise in magazines,but guests often recommend them to friends by word of mouth. The Guest House is approved by the Heart of England Tourist Board, but, before they could be approved, they had to answer such questions as,"Is the house fully carpeted? Have you got showers? Is there hot and cold water in the rooms,and central heating?"
